sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button} from '../ButtonElements' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoElements'; const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, desciption, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary,dark1,dark2}) => { return ( {topLine} {headline} {desciption} ) } export default InfoSection
